00056 CellStoreV1::CellStoreV1(Filesystem *filesys)
00057   : m_filesys(filesys), m_fd(-1), m_filename(), m_64bit_index(false),
00058     m_compressor(0), m_buffer(0), m_outstanding_appends(0), m_offset(0),
00059     m_last_key(0), m_file_length(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_file_id(0),
00060     m_uncompressed_blocksize(0), m_bloom_filter_mode(BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED),
00061     m_bloom_filter(0), m_bloom_filter_items(0), m_bloom_filter_memory(0),
00062     m_block_index_memory(0), m_bloom_filter_access_counter(0),
00063     m_block_index_access_counter(0), m_restricted_range(false) {
00064   m_file_id = FileBlockCache::get_next_file_id();
00065   assert(sizeof(float) == 4);
00066 }

00069 CellStoreV1::~CellStoreV1() {
00070   try {
00071     delete m_compressor;
00072     delete m_bloom_filter;
00073     delete m_bloom_filter_items;
00074     if (m_fd != -1)
00075       m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00076   }
00077   catch (Exception &e) {
00078     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00079   }
00080 
00081   if (m_bloom_filter_memory + m_block_index_memory > 0)
00082     Global::memory_tracker.subtract( m_bloom_filter_memory + m_block_index_memory );
00083 
00084 }

00104 CellListScanner *CellStoreV1::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) {
00105   bool need_index =  m_restricted_range || scan_ctx->restricted_range;
00106 
00107   if (need_index) {
00108     m_block_index_access_counter = ++Global::access_counter;
00109     if (m_block_index_memory == 0)
00110       load_block_index();
00111   }
00112 
00113   if (m_64bit_index)
00114     return new CellStoreScanner<CellStoreBlockIndexMap<int64_t> >(this, scan_ctx, need_index ? &m_index_map64 : 0);
00115   return new CellStoreScanner<CellStoreBlockIndexMap<uint32_t> >(this, scan_ctx, need_index ? &m_index_map32 : 0);
00116 }

00119 void
00120 CellStoreV1::create(const char *fname, size_t max_entries,
00121                     PropertiesPtr &props) {
00122   int64_t blocksize = props->get("blocksize", uint32_t(0));
00123   String compressor = props->get("compressor", String());
00124 
00125   assert(Config::properties); // requires Config::init* first
00126 
00127   if (blocksize == 0)
00128     blocksize = Config::get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.CellStore"
00129                                 ".DefaultBlockSize");
00130   if (compressor.empty())
00131     compressor = Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer.CellStore"
00132                                  ".DefaultCompressor");
00133   if (!props->has("bloom-filter-mode")) {
00134     // probably not called from AccessGroup
00135     Schema::parse_bloom_filter(Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer"
00136         ".CellStore.DefaultBloomFilter"), props);
00137   }
00138 
00139   m_buffer.reserve(blocksize*4);
00140 
00141   m_max_entries = max_entries;
00142 
00143   m_fd = -1;
00144   m_offset = 0;
00145   m_last_key = 0;
00146 
00147   m_index_builder.fixed_buf().reserve(4*4096);
00148   m_index_builder.variable_buf().reserve(1024*1024);
00149 
00150   m_uncompressed_data = 0.0;
00151   m_compressed_data = 0.0;
00152 
00153   m_trailer.clear();
00154   m_trailer.blocksize = blocksize;
00155   m_uncompressed_blocksize = blocksize;
00156 
00157   m_filename = fname;
00158 
00159   m_start_row = "";
00160   m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00161 
00162   m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00163       compressor, m_compressor_args);
00164 
00165   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00166       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type,
00167       m_compressor_args);
00168 
00169   m_fd = m_filesys->create(m_filename, true, -1, -1, -1);
00170 
00171   m_bloom_filter_mode = props->get<BloomFilterMode>("bloom-filter-mode");
00172   m_max_approx_items = props->get_i32("max-approx-items");
00173   m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob = props->get_f64("false-positive");
00174 
00175   if (m_bloom_filter_mode != BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED) {
00176     m_bloom_filter_items = new BloomFilterItems(); // aproximator items
00177   }
00178   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"bloom-filter-mode="<< m_bloom_filter_mode
00179       <<" max-approx-items="<< m_max_approx_items <<" false-positive="
00180       << m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob << HT_END;
00181 }

00183 
00184 void CellStoreV1::create_bloom_filter(bool is_approx) {
00185   assert(!m_bloom_filter && m_bloom_filter_items);
00186 
00187   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Creating new BloomFilter for CellStore '"
00188     << m_filename <<"' for "<< (is_approx ? "estimated " : "")
00189     << m_trailer.num_filter_items << " items"<< HT_END;
00190 
00191   m_bloom_filter = new BloomFilter(m_trailer.num_filter_items,
00192       m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob);
00193 
00194   foreach(const Blob &blob, *m_bloom_filter_items)
00195     m_bloom_filter->insert(blob.start, blob.size);
00196 
00197   delete m_bloom_filter_items;
00198   m_bloom_filter_items = 0;
00199 
00200   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Created new BloomFilter for CellStore '"
00201     << m_filename <<"'"<< HT_END;
00202 }

00204 
00205 void CellStoreV1::load_bloom_filter() {
00206   size_t len, amount;
00207 
00208   HT_ASSERT(m_bloom_filter_memory == 0);
00209 
00210   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Loading BloomFilter for CellStore '"
00211                << m_filename <<"' with "<< m_trailer.num_filter_items
00212                << " items"<< HT_END;
00213 
00214   m_bloom_filter = new BloomFilter(m_trailer.num_filter_items,
00215                                    m_trailer.filter_false_positive_prob);
00216 
00217   amount = (m_file_length - m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.filter_offset;
00218   if (amount > 0) {
00219     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, m_bloom_filter->ptr(), amount,
00220                            m_trailer.filter_offset);
00221 
00222     if (len != amount)
00223       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Problem loading bloomfilter for"
00224                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %lld but only got %lld",
00225                 m_filename.c_str(), (Lld)amount, (Lld)len);
00226   }
00227 
00228   m_bloom_filter_memory = m_bloom_filter->size();
00229   Global::memory_tracker.add(m_bloom_filter_memory);
00230   
00231 }

00234 
00235 int64_t CellStoreV1::purgeable_index_memory(uint64_t access_counter) {
00236   int64_t total = 0;
00237   if (m_bloom_filter_access_counter <= access_counter)
00238     total += m_bloom_filter_memory;
00239   if (m_block_index_access_counter <= access_counter)
00240     total += m_block_index_memory;
00241   return total;
00242 }
00243 
00244 
00245 
00246 void CellStoreV1::maybe_purge_indexes(uint64_t access_counter) {
00247 
00248   if (m_bloom_filter_memory > 0 &&
00249       m_bloom_filter_access_counter <= access_counter) {
00250     delete m_bloom_filter;
00251     m_bloom_filter = 0;
00252     Global::memory_tracker.subtract( m_bloom_filter_memory );
00253     HT_INFOF("Purged %lld bytes of bloom filter memory", (Lld)m_bloom_filter_memory);
00254     m_bloom_filter_memory = 0;
00255   }
00256 
00257   if (m_block_index_memory > 0 &&
00258       m_block_index_access_counter <= access_counter) {
00259     if (m_64bit_index)
00260       m_index_map64.clear();
00261     else
00262       m_index_map32.clear();
00263     Global::memory_tracker.subtract( m_block_index_memory );
00264     HT_INFOF("Purged %lld bytes of block index memory", (Lld)m_block_index_memory);
00265     m_block_index_memory = 0;
00266   }
00267 
00268 }

00271 
00272 void CellStoreV1::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00273   EventPtr event_ptr;
00274   DynamicBuffer zbuf;
00275 
00276   if (key.revision > m_trailer.revision)
00277     m_trailer.revision = key.revision;
00278 
00279   if (key.timestamp != TIMESTAMP_NULL) {
00280     if (key.timestamp < m_trailer.timestamp_min)
00281       m_trailer.timestamp_min = key.timestamp;
00282     else if (key.timestamp > m_trailer.timestamp_max)
00283       m_trailer.timestamp_max = key.timestamp;
00284   }
00285 
00286   if (m_buffer.fill() > (size_t)m_uncompressed_blocksize) {
00287     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00288 
00289     m_index_builder.add_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00290 
00291     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00292     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00293     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00294     m_buffer.clear();
00295 
00296     uint64_t llval = ((uint64_t)m_trailer.blocksize
00297         * (uint64_t)m_uncompressed_data) / (uint64_t)m_compressed_data;
00298     m_uncompressed_blocksize = (int64_t)llval;
00299 
00300     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00301       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00302         if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE)
00303           HT_THROWF(Hypertable::Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00304              "Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00305              Hypertable::Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00306         HT_THROWF(event_ptr->error,
00307                   "Problem writing to DFS file '%s'", m_filename.c_str());
00308       }
00309       m_outstanding_appends--;
00310     }
00311 
00312     size_t zlen = zbuf.fill();
00313     StaticBuffer send_buf(zbuf);
00314 
00315     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00316     catch (Exception &e) {
00317       HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem writing to DFS file '%s'",
00318                  m_filename.c_str());
00319     }
00320     m_outstanding_appends++;
00321     m_offset += zlen;
00322   }
00323 
00324   size_t value_len = value.length();
00325 
00326   m_buffer.ensure(key.length + value_len);
00327 
00328   m_last_key.ptr = m_buffer.add_unchecked(key.serial.ptr, key.length);
00329   m_buffer.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00330 
00331   if (m_bloom_filter_mode != BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED) {
00332     if (m_trailer.total_entries < m_max_approx_items) {
00333       m_bloom_filter_items->insert(key.row, key.row_len);
00334 
00335       if (m_bloom_filter_mode == BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS_COLS)
00336         m_bloom_filter_items->insert(key.row, key.row_len + 2);
00337 
00338       if (m_trailer.total_entries == m_max_approx_items - 1) {
00339         m_trailer.num_filter_items = (size_t)(((double)m_max_entries
00340             / (double)m_max_approx_items) * m_bloom_filter_items->size());
00341         create_bloom_filter(true);
00342       }
00343     }
00344     else {
00345       assert(!m_bloom_filter_items && m_bloom_filter);
00346 
00347       m_bloom_filter->insert(key.row);
00348 
00349       if (m_bloom_filter_mode == BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS_COLS)
00350         m_bloom_filter->insert(key.row, key.row_len + 2);
00351     }
00352   }
00353 
00354   m_trailer.total_entries++;
00355 }

00357 
00358 void CellStoreV1::finalize(TableIdentifier *table_identifier) {
00359   EventPtr event_ptr;
00360   size_t zlen;
00361   DynamicBuffer zbuf(0);
00362   SerializedKey key;
00363   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00364   int64_t index_memory = 0;
00365 
00366   if (m_buffer.fill() > 0) {
00367     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00368 
00369     m_index_builder.add_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00370 
00371     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00372     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00373     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00374 
00375     zlen = zbuf.fill();
00376     send_buf = zbuf;
00377 
00378     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00379       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00380         HT_THROWF(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00381                   "Problem finalizing CellStore file '%s' : %s",
00382                   m_filename.c_str(),
00383                   Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00384       m_outstanding_appends--;
00385     }
00386 
00387     m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00388 
00389     m_outstanding_appends++;
00390     m_offset += zlen;
00391   }
00392 
00393   m_buffer.free();
00394 
00395   m_trailer.fix_index_offset = m_offset;
00396   if (m_uncompressed_data == 0)
00397     m_trailer.compression_ratio = 1.0;
00398   else
00399     m_trailer.compression_ratio = m_compressed_data / m_uncompressed_data;
00400 
00404   m_index_builder.chop();
00405 
00409   {
00410     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00411     m_compressor->deflate(m_index_builder.fixed_buf(), zbuf, header);
00412   }
00413 
00414   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00415   send_buf = zbuf;
00416 
00417   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00418 
00419   m_outstanding_appends++;
00420   m_offset += zlen;
00421 
00425   {
00426     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00427     m_trailer.var_index_offset = m_offset;
00428     m_compressor->deflate(m_index_builder.variable_buf(), zbuf, header);
00429   }
00430 
00431   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00432   send_buf = zbuf;
00433 
00434   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00435 
00436   m_outstanding_appends++;
00437   m_offset += zlen;
00438 
00439   // write filter_offset
00440   m_trailer.filter_offset = m_offset;
00441 
00442   // if bloom_items haven't been spilled to create a bloom filter yet, do it
00443   if (m_bloom_filter_mode != BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED) {
00444     if (m_bloom_filter_items) {
00445       m_trailer.num_filter_items = m_bloom_filter_items->size();
00446       create_bloom_filter();
00447     }
00448     assert(!m_bloom_filter_items && m_bloom_filter);
00449 
00450     m_bloom_filter->serialize(send_buf);
00451     m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler);
00452 
00453     m_outstanding_appends++;
00454     m_offset += m_bloom_filter->size();
00455   }
00456 
00457   m_64bit_index = m_index_builder.big_int();
00458 
00460   if (m_64bit_index) {
00461     m_index_map64.load(m_index_builder.fixed_buf(),
00462                        m_index_builder.variable_buf(),
00463                        m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00464     record_split_row( m_index_map64.middle_key() );
00465     index_memory = m_index_map64.memory_used();
00466     m_trailer.flags |= CellStoreTrailerV1::INDEX_64BIT;
00467   }
00468   else {
00469     m_index_map32.load(m_index_builder.fixed_buf(),
00470                        m_index_builder.variable_buf(),
00471                        m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00472     index_memory = m_index_map32.memory_used();
00473     record_split_row( m_index_map32.middle_key() );
00474   }
00475 
00476   // deallocate fix index data
00477   m_index_builder.release_fixed_buf();
00478 
00479   // Add table information
00480   m_trailer.table_id = table_identifier->id;
00481   m_trailer.table_generation = table_identifier->generation;
00482   {
00483     boost::xtime now;
00484     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00485     m_trailer.create_time = ((int64_t)now.sec * 1000000000LL) + (int64_t)now.nsec;
00486   }
00487 
00488   // write trailer
00489   zbuf.clear();
00490   zbuf.reserve(m_trailer.size());
00491   m_trailer.serialize(zbuf.ptr);
00492   zbuf.ptr += m_trailer.size();
00493 
00494   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00495   send_buf = zbuf;
00496 
00497   m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf);
00498 
00499   m_outstanding_appends++;
00500   m_offset += zlen;
00501 
00503   m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00504 
00506   m_file_length = m_offset;
00507 
00509   m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00510 
00511   m_disk_usage = m_file_length;
00512 
00513   m_block_index_memory = sizeof(CellStoreV1) + index_memory;
00514 
00515   if (m_bloom_filter)
00516     m_bloom_filter_memory = m_bloom_filter->size();
00517 
00518   Global::memory_tracker.add( m_block_index_memory + m_bloom_filter_memory );
00519 }
00520 
00521 
00522 void CellStoreV1::IndexBuilder::add_entry(const SerializedKey key,
00523                                           int64_t offset) {
00524 
00525   // switch to 64-bit offsets if offset being added is >= 2^32
00526   if (!m_bigint && offset >= 4294967296LL) {
00527     DynamicBuffer tmp_buf(m_fixed.size*2);
00528     const uint8_t *src = m_fixed.base;
00529     uint8_t *dst = tmp_buf.base;
00530     size_t remaining = m_fixed.fill();
00531     while (src < m_fixed.ptr)
00532       Serialization::encode_i64(&dst, (uint64_t)Serialization::decode_i32(&src, &remaining));
00533     delete [] m_fixed.release();
00534     m_fixed.base = tmp_buf.base;
00535     m_fixed.ptr = dst;
00536     m_fixed.size = tmp_buf.size;
00537     m_fixed.own = true;
00538     tmp_buf.release();
00539     m_bigint = true;
00540   }
00541 
00542   // Add key to variable buffer
00543   size_t key_len = key.length();
00544   m_variable.ensure(key_len);
00545   memcpy(m_variable.ptr, key.ptr, key_len);
00546   m_variable.ptr += key_len;
00547 
00548     // Serialize offset into fix index buffer
00549   if (m_bigint) {
00550     m_fixed.ensure(8);
00551     memcpy(m_fixed.ptr, &offset, 8);
00552     m_fixed.ptr += 8;
00553   }
00554   else {
00555     m_fixed.ensure(4);
00556     memcpy(m_fixed.ptr, &offset, 4);
00557     m_fixed.ptr += 4;
00558   }
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00562 void CellStoreV1::IndexBuilder::chop() {
00563   uint8_t *base;
00564   size_t len;
00565 
00566   base = m_fixed.release(&len);
00567   m_fixed.reserve(len);
00568   m_fixed.add_unchecked(base, len);
00569   delete [] base;
00570 
00571   base = m_variable.release(&len);
00572   m_variable.reserve(len);
00573   m_variable.add_unchecked(base, len);
00574   delete [] base;
00575 }

00577 
00578 
00579 void
00580 CellStoreV1::open(const String &fname, const String &start_row,
00581                   const String &end_row, int32_t fd, int64_t file_length,
00582                   CellStoreTrailer *trailer) {
00583   m_filename = fname;
00584   m_start_row = start_row;
00585   m_end_row = end_row;
00586   m_fd = fd;
00587   m_file_length = file_length;
00588 
00589   m_restricted_range = !(m_start_row == "" && m_end_row == Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00590 
00591   m_trailer = *static_cast<CellStoreTrailerV1 *>(trailer);
00592 
00594   HT_ASSERT(m_trailer.version == 1);
00595 
00596   if (m_trailer.flags & CellStoreTrailerV1::INDEX_64BIT)
00597     m_64bit_index = true;
00598 
00599   if (!(m_trailer.fix_index_offset < m_trailer.var_index_offset &&
00600         m_trailer.var_index_offset < m_file_length))
00601     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_CELLSTORE,
00602               "Bad index offsets in CellStore trailer fix=%lld, var=%lld, "
00603               "length=%llu, file='%s'", (Lld)m_trailer.fix_index_offset,
00604            (Lld)m_trailer.var_index_offset, (Llu)m_file_length, fname.c_str());
00605 
00606   if (!(start_row == "" && end_row == Key::END_ROW_MARKER))
00607     load_block_index();
00608 
00609 }
00610 
00611 
00612 void CellStoreV1::load_block_index() {
00613   int64_t amount, index_amount;
00614   int64_t len = 0;
00615   BlockCompressionHeader header;
00616   SerializedKey key;
00617   bool inflating_fixed=true;
00618   bool second_try = false;
00619   
00620   HT_ASSERT(m_block_index_memory == 0);
00621   
00622   if (m_compressor == 0)
00623     m_compressor = create_block_compression_codec();
00624 
00625   amount = index_amount = m_trailer.filter_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset;
00626 
00627  try_again:
00628 
00629   try {
00630     DynamicBuffer buf(amount);
00631 
00632     if (second_try)
00633       reopen_fd();
00634 
00636     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, buf.ptr, amount, m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00637 
00638     if (len != amount)
00639       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error loading index for "
00640                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %lld but only got %lld",
00641                 m_filename.c_str(), (Lld)amount, (Lld)len);
00643     buf.ptr += (m_trailer.var_index_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00644     m_compressor->inflate(buf, m_index_builder.fixed_buf(), header);
00645 
00646     inflating_fixed = false;
00647 
00648     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00649       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, m_filename);
00650 
00652     DynamicBuffer vbuf(0, false);
00653     amount = m_trailer.filter_offset - m_trailer.var_index_offset;
00654     vbuf.base = buf.ptr;
00655     vbuf.ptr = buf.ptr + amount;
00656 
00657     m_compressor->inflate(vbuf, m_index_builder.variable_buf(), header);
00658 
00659     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00660       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, m_filename);
00661   }
00662   catch (Exception &e) {
00663     String msg;
00664     if (inflating_fixed) {
00665       msg = String("Error inflating FIXED index for cellstore '")
00666             + m_filename + "'";
00667       HT_ERROR_OUT << msg << ": "<< e << HT_END;
00668     }
00669     else {
00670       msg = "Error inflating VARIABLE index for cellstore '" + m_filename + "'";
00671       HT_ERROR_OUT << msg << ": " <<  e << HT_END;
00672     }
00673     HT_ERROR_OUT << "pread(fd=" << m_fd << ", len=" << len << ", amount="
00674         << index_amount << ")\n" << HT_END;
00675     HT_ERROR_OUT << m_trailer << HT_END;
00676     if (second_try)
00677       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, msg);
00678     second_try = true;
00679     goto try_again;
00680   }
00681 
00683   if (m_64bit_index) {
00684     m_index_map64.load(m_index_builder.fixed_buf(),
00685                        m_index_builder.variable_buf(),
00686                        m_trailer.fix_index_offset, m_start_row, m_end_row);
00687     record_split_row( m_index_map64.middle_key() );
00688   }
00689   else {
00690     m_index_map32.load(m_index_builder.fixed_buf(),
00691                        m_index_builder.variable_buf(),
00692                        m_trailer.fix_index_offset, m_start_row, m_end_row);
00693     record_split_row( m_index_map32.middle_key() );
00694   }
00695 
00696   m_disk_usage = m_index_map32.disk_used();
00697 
00698   m_block_index_memory = sizeof(CellStoreV1) + m_index_map32.memory_used();
00699   Global::memory_tracker.add( m_block_index_memory );
00700 
00701   m_index_builder.release_fixed_buf();
00702 
00703 }
00704 
00705 
00706 bool CellStoreV1::may_contain(ScanContextPtr &scan_context) {
00707 
00708   if (m_bloom_filter == 0)
00709     load_bloom_filter();
00710 
00711   m_bloom_filter_access_counter = ++Global::access_counter;
00712 
00713   switch (m_bloom_filter_mode) {
00714     case BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS:
00715       return may_contain(scan_context->start_row);
00716     case BLOOM_FILTER_ROWS_COLS:
00717       if (may_contain(scan_context->start_row)) {
00718         SchemaPtr &schema = scan_context->schema;
00719         size_t rowlen = scan_context->start_row.length();
00720         boost::scoped_array<char> rowcol(new char[rowlen + 2]);
00721         memcpy(rowcol.get(), scan_context->start_row.c_str(), rowlen + 1);
00722 
00723         foreach(const char *col, scan_context->spec->columns) {
00724           uint8_t column_family_id = schema->get_column_family(col)->id;
00725           rowcol[rowlen + 1] = column_family_id;
00726 
00727           if (may_contain(rowcol.get(), rowlen + 2))
00728             return true;
00729         }
00730       }
00731       return false;
00732     case BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED:
00733       return true;
00734     default:
00735       HT_ASSERT(!"unpossible bloom filter mode!");
00736   }
00737   return false; // silence stupid compilers
00738 }
00739 
00740 
00741 bool CellStoreV1::may_contain(const void *ptr, size_t len) {
00742   if (m_bloom_filter == 0)
00743     load_bloom_filter();
00744   m_bloom_filter_access_counter = ++Global::access_counter;
00745   bool may_contain = m_bloom_filter->may_contain(ptr, len);
00746   return may_contain;
00747 }
00748 
00749 
00750 
00751 void CellStoreV1::display_block_info() {
00752   if (m_block_index_memory == 0)
00753     load_block_index();
00754   if (m_64bit_index)
00755     m_index_map64.display();
00756   else
00757     m_index_map32.display();
00758 }
00759 
00760 
00761 
00762 void CellStoreV1::record_split_row(const SerializedKey key) {
00763   if (key.ptr) {
00764     std::string split_row = key.row();
00765     if (split_row > m_start_row && split_row < m_end_row)
00766       m_split_row = split_row;
00767   }
00768 }
